verses.verse: <S%G1161><s%> There was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the P'rushim <S%G5330><s%>, named <S%G3686><s%> <S%G846><s%> Nakdimon <S%G3530><s%>, a ruler <S%G758><s%> of the Jews <S%G2453><s%>:

The same <S%G3778><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5627><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> by night <S%G3571><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Rabbi <S%G4461><s%>, we know <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5758><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> thou art <S%G2064><s%> a teacher <S%G1320><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5754><s%> from <S%G575><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> <S%G5736><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5721><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> miracles <S%G4592><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> doest <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, except <S%G3362><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> be <S%G5600><s%> <S%G5753><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> <S%G5662><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Verily <S%G281><s%>, verily <S%G281><s%>, I say <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%>, Except <S%G3362><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> be born <S%G1080><s%> <S%G5686><s%> again <S%G509><s%>, he cannot <S%G1410><s%> <S%G5736><s%> <S%G3756><s%> see <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5629><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>.

Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> <S%G5662><s%>, Verily <S%G281><s%>, verily <S%G281><s%>, I say <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%>, Except <S%G3362><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> be born <S%G1080><s%> <S%G5686><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> water <S%G5204><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the Spirit <S%G4151><s%>, he cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> <S%G5736><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> <S%G5629><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>.

That which is born <S%G1080><s%> <S%G5772><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> that which is born <S%G1080><s%> <S%G5772><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%>.

The wind <S%G4151><s%> bloweth <S%G4154><s%> <S%G5719><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> it listeth <S%G2309><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> thou hearest <S%G191><s%> <S%G5719><s%> the sound <S%G5456><s%> thereof <S%G846><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> canst <S%G1492><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> tell <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5758><s%> whence <S%G4159><s%> it cometh <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5736><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> whither <S%G4226><s%> it goeth <S%G5217><s%> <S%G5719><s%>: so <S%G3779><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> every one <S%G3956><s%> that is born <S%G1080><s%> <S%G5772><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%>.

Nakdimon <S%G3530><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> <S%G5662><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, How <S%G4459><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> <S%G5736><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> be <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5635><s%>?

Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> <S%G5662><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Art <S%G1488><s%> <S%G5748><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> a master <S%G1320><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%G2474><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> knowest <S%G1097><s%> <S%G5719><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%>?

Verily <S%G281><s%>, verily <S%G281><s%>, I say <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%>, We speak <S%G2980><s%> <S%G5719><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3739><s%> we do know <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5758><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> testify <S%G3140><s%> <S%G5719><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> we have seen <S%G3708><s%> <S%G5758><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> ye receive <S%G2983><s%> <S%G5719><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> witness <S%G3141><s%>.

If <S%G1487><s%> I have told <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> earthly things <S%G1919><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> ye believe <S%G4100><s%> <S%G5719><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>, how <S%G4459><s%> shall ye believe <S%G4100><s%> <S%G5692><s%>, if <S%G1437><s%> I tell <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5632><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> of heavenly things <S%G2032><s%>?

And <S%G2532><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%> hath ascended up <S%G305><s%> <S%G5758><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, but <S%G1508><s%> he that came down <S%G2597><s%> <S%G5631><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, even the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is <S%G5607><s%> <S%G5752><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> Mosheh <S%G3475><s%> lifted up <S%G5312><s%> <S%G5656><s%> the serpent <S%G3789><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the wilderness <S%G2048><s%>, even so <S%G3779><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> <S%G5748><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> be lifted up <S%G5312><s%> <S%G5683><s%>:

That <S%G3363><s%> whosoever <S%G3956><s%> believeth <S%G4100><s%> <S%G5723><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> him <S%G846><s%> should <S%G622><s%> not <S%G3363><s%> perish <S%G622><s%> <S%G5643><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5725><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life <S%G2222><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> loved <S%G25><s%> <S%G5656><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%>, that <S%G5620><s%> he gave <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5656><s%> his <S%G846><s%> only begotten <S%G3439><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> whosoever <S%G3956><s%> believeth <S%G4100><s%> <S%G5723><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> him <S%G846><s%> should <S%G622><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> perish <S%G622><s%> <S%G5643><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5725><s%> everlasting <S%G166><s%> life <S%G2222><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> <S%G5656><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> his <S%G846><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> condemn <S%G2919><s%> <S%G5725><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> him <S%G846><s%> might be saved <S%G4982><s%> <S%G5686><s%>.

He that believeth <S%G4100><s%> <S%G5723><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> him <S%G846><s%> is <S%G2919><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> condemned <S%G2919><s%> <S%G5743><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> he that believeth <S%G4100><s%> <S%G5723><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> is condemned <S%G2919><s%> <S%G5769><s%> already <S%G2235><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> he hath <S%G4100><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%> <S%G5758><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of the only begotten <S%G3439><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> the condemnation <S%G2920><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> light <S%G5457><s%> is come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5754><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> men <S%G444><s%> loved <S%G25><s%> <S%G5656><s%> darkness <S%G4655><s%> rather <S%G3123><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> light <S%G5457><s%>, because <S%G1063><s%> their <S%G846><s%> deeds <S%G2041><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> evil <S%G4190><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> every one <S%G3956><s%> that doeth <S%G4238><s%> <S%G5723><s%> evil <S%G5337><s%> hateth <S%G3404><s%> <S%G5719><s%> the light <S%G5457><s%>, neither <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> cometh <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5736><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> the light <S%G5457><s%>, lest <S%G3363><s%> his <S%G846><s%> deeds <S%G2041><s%> should be reproved <S%G1651><s%> <S%G5686><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> he that doeth <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5723><s%> truth <S%G225><s%> cometh <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5736><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> the light <S%G5457><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> his <S%G846><s%> deeds <S%G2041><s%> may be made manifest <S%G5319><s%> <S%G5686><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> they are <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> wrought <S%G2038><s%> <S%G5772><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>.

After <S%G3326><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5627><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> Talmidim <S%G3101><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the land <S%G1093><s%> of Judaea <S%G2449><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> he tarried <S%G1304><s%> <S%G5707><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> immersed <S%G907><s%> <S%G5707><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> Yochanan <S%G2491><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> baptizing <S%G907><s%> <S%G5723><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Aenon <S%G137><s%> near <S%G1451><s%> to Salim <S%G4530><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> there was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> water <S%G5204><s%> there <S%G1563><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> they came <S%G3854><s%> <S%G5708><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> were immersed <S%G907><s%> <S%G5712><s%>.
For <S%G1063><s%> Yochanan <S%G2491><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> not yet <S%G3768><s%> cast <S%G906><s%> <S%G5772><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> prison <S%G5438><s%>.

Then <S%G3767><s%> there arose <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5633><s%> a question <S%G2214><s%> between <S%G3326><s%> some of <S%G1537><s%> Yochanan's <S%G2491><s%> Talmidim <S%G3101><s%> and the Jews <S%G2453><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> purifying <S%G2512><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they came <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> Yochanan <S%G2491><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Rabbi <S%G4461><s%>, he <S%G3739><s%> that was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> thee <S%G4675><s%> beyond <S%G4008><s%> Yarden <S%G2446><s%>, to whom <S%G3739><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> barest witness <S%G3140><s%> <S%G5758><s%>, behold <S%G2396><s%>, the same <S%G3778><s%> immerseht <S%G907><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5736><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

He that hath <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> the bride <S%G3565><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> the bridegroom <S%G3566><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> the friend <S%G5384><s%> of the bridegroom <S%G3566><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> standeth <S%G2476><s%> <S%G5761><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> heareth <S%G191><s%> <S%G5723><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, rejoiceth <S%G5463><s%> <S%G5719><s%> greatly <S%G5479><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of the bridegroom's <S%G3566><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%>: this <S%G3778><s%> my <S%G1699><s%> joy <S%G5479><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> is fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> <S%G5769><s%>.

He that cometh <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5740><s%> from above <S%G509><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> above <S%G1883><s%> all <S%G3956><s%>: he that is <S%G5607><s%> <S%G5752><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> earthly <S%G1537><s%> <S%G1093><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> speaketh <S%G2980><s%> <S%G5719><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>: he that cometh <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5740><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> above <S%G1883><s%> all <S%G3956><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> he hath seen <S%G3708><s%> <S%G5758><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G5656><s%>, that <S%G5124><s%> he testifieth <S%G3140><s%> <S%G5719><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%> receiveth <S%G2983><s%> <S%G5719><s%> his <S%G846><s%> testimony <S%G3141><s%>.

He that hath received <S%G2983><s%> <S%G5631><s%> his <S%G846><s%> testimony <S%G3141><s%> hath set to his seal <S%G4972><s%> <S%G5656><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> true <S%G227><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> he whom <S%G3739><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> hath sent <S%G649><s%> <S%G5656><s%> speaketh <S%G2980><s%> <S%G5719><s%> the words <S%G4487><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> giveth <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5719><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> measure <S%G3358><s%> unto him.

The Father <S%G3962><s%> loveth <S%G25><s%> <S%G5719><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> hath given <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5758><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> into <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%>.

He that believeth <S%G4100><s%> <S%G5723><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5719><s%> everlasting <S%G166><s%> life <S%G2222><s%>: and <S%G1161><s%> he that believeth not <S%G544><s%> <S%G5723><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> shall <S%G3700><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> see <S%G3700><s%> <S%G5695><s%> life <S%G2222><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> the wrath <S%G3709><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> abideth <S%G3306><s%> <S%G5719><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.
